name: Dragon AK
description: On top of the list of best gun skins in Free Fire is Dragon AK. This is the most popular skin among Free Fire players. It is also the hardest skin to get in Free Fire. This legendary gun skin doubles the fire rate of the weapon, increases the damage and stability but does not meddle with the range of the weapon. Dragon AK skin can be obtained through New Year events.

name: Black Widow Ocean (Famas)
description: Among the top gun skins in Free Fire, Black widow ocean skin is the best skin that improves the ability of the Famas gun. Similar to Dragon AK, Black Widow Ocean gives the Famas gun improvements of double fire rate, increased damage, and decreased magazine capacity.

name: Venom M4A1
description: Venom M4A1 gives your weapon the same improvements as Dragon AK and Black Widow Ocean, which increases the fire rate of your weapon by twice and increase damage as well. This skin can be acquired from the Cataclysm Set with a price of 40 diamonds.
